creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
All the *.txt files (README.txt etc.) in the root directory do not have Windows-
style line-ends.

That makes it difficult to read those files using Notpad.

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: This should be tested before 1.2.1 is released.

Interestng here is, that svn:eol-style is set to native for all files, but it
does not seem to work. Do we have to commit all the files in order to have to
linebreaks changed? I will make a test on trunk.
creator: roku@apache.org
